title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1225.11 - Garbage, waste paper and refuse to be deposited in receptacles provided therefor
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1225.11 - Garbage, waste paper and refuse to be deposited in receptacles provided therefor

State Regulations

No person shall place garbage, waste papers or other
refuse material in a truck terminal except in receptacles provided for that
purpose. All receptacles used at a truck terminal shall be placed only at such
locations as the superintendent may direct. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1225.11

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
